document.docTitle: Rhumosa macoucheriei Hugel & Desutter-Grandcolas 2018, n. gen.
document.masterDocTitle: A new genus and five new species of Anostostomatidae from the Lesser Antilles (Orthoptera: Ensifera)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new genus and five new species of Anostostomatidae from the Lesser Antilles (Orthoptera: Ensifera)

heading.emphasis:
Rhumosa macoucheriei
n. gen. n. sp.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Rhumosa macoucheriei
n. gen. n. sp.
, here described.
Holotype male. Lesser Antilles, Dominique, Glo Gommier, 15.450°N, 61.320°O, 500 m alt., 27.vii.2008 , S. Hugel leg., (Dominique2008 0 66, ♂), MNHN (MNHN-EO-ENSIF7104).

Paratypes. same as holotype, 27.vii.2008 , S. Hugel leg., (Dominique2008 0 65, ♂), coll. SH. Dominique, Pont Cassé nord-est, Morne Trois Pitons trail, 15.377°N, 61.337°W, 745 m alt., 31.vii.2008 , S. Hugel leg., (Dominique2008 0 98, ♀, Allotype), MNHN (MNHN-EO-ENSIF7105); 25.vii.2008 ; S. Hugel leg., (Dominique2008 26, ♂), coll. SH; 25.vii.2008 ; S. Hugel leg., (Dominique2008 27, ♂), coll. SH; 25.vii.2008 ; S. Hugel leg., (Dominique2008 28, ♀), coll. SH.; 25.vii.2008 ; S. Hugel leg., (Dominique 2008 29, ♀), coll. SH; 25.vii.2008 ; S. Hugel leg., (Dominique2008 30, juv), coll. SH.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 1–20.
Rhumosa
n. gen. head and pronotum.
1, 5, 9, 13, 17: face in front view. 2, 6, 10, 14, 18: occiput in dorsal view. 3, 7, 11, 15, 19: head and pronotum in left side view. 4, 8, 12, 16, 20: fastigium in front view. 1 – 4:
Rhumosa bolognei
n. gen. n. sp.
5 – 8:
Rhumosa macoucheriei
n. gen. n. sp.
9 – 12:
Rhumosa depazei
n. gen. n. sp.
13 – 16:
Rhumosa admiralrodneyei
n. gen. n. sp.
17 – 20:
Rhumosa captainblighei
n. gen. n. sp.

FIGURES 21–40.
Rhumosa
n. gen. legs.
21, 25, 29, 33, 37: left fore tibia in side view (top: inner view, bottom: outer view). 22, 26, 30, 34, 38: left mid tibia in side view (top: inner view, bottom: outer view). 23, 27, 31, 35, 39: left hind femora in side view. 24, 28, 32, 36, 40: left hind tibia in outer side view (a), distal part of left hind tibia in inner side view (b). 21 – 24:
Rhumosa bolognei
n. gen. n. sp.
25 – 28:
Rhumosa macoucheriei
n. gen. n. sp.
29 – 32:
Rhumosa depazei
n. gen. n. sp.
33 – 36:
Rhumosa admiralrodneyei
n. gen. n. sp.
37 – 40:
Rhumosa captainblighei
n. gen. n. sp.

FIGURES 41–65.
Rhumosa
n. gen. male terminalia.
41, 46, 51, 56, 61: male terminalia in posterior view. 42, 47, 52, 57, 62: male terminalia in dorsal view. 43, 48, 53, 58, 63: male terminalia in ventral view. 44, 49, 54, 59, 64: male tergite X in posterior view. 45, 50, 55, 60, 65: male subgenital plate in posterior view. 41 – 45:
Rhumosa bolognei
n. gen. n. sp.
46 – 50:
Rhumosa macoucheriei
n. gen. n. sp.
51 – 55:
Rhumosa depazei
n. gen. n. sp.
56 – 60:
Rhumosa admiralrodneyei
n. gen. n. sp.
61 – 65:
Rhumosa captainblighei
n. gen. n. sp.

FIGURES 66–85.
Rhumosa
n. gen. male genitalia and paraprocts.
66, 70, 74, 78, 82: male phallic complex in dorsal view. 67, 71, 75, 79, 83: male right epiphallic apodeme in side view, removed from phallic complex (distal side on bottom). 68, 72, 76, 80, 84: male epiphallic apodeme in posterior view (lateral side on top). 69, 73, 77, 81, 85: isolated male left paraproct and cercus basis in posterior view. 66 – 69:
Rhumosa bolognei
n. gen. n. sp.
70 – 73:
Rhumosa macoucheriei
n. gen. n. sp.
74 – 77:
Rhumosa depazei
n. gen. n. sp.
78 – 81:
Rhumosa admiralrodneyei
n. gen. n. sp.
82 – 85:
Rhumosa captainblighei
n. gen. n. sp.

FIGURES 86–95.
Rhumosa
n. gen. female terminalia.
86, 88, 90, 92, 94: ovipositor in left side view. 87, 89, 91, 93, 95: subgenital plate in ventral view. 86 – 87:
Rhumosa bolognei
n. gen. n. sp.
88 – 89:
Rhumosa macoucheriei
n. gen. n. sp.
90 – 91:
Rhumosa depazei
n. gen. n. sp.
92 – 93:
Rhumosa admiralrodneyei
n. gen. n. sp.
94 – 95:
Rhumosa captainblighei
n. gen. n. sp.

FIGURES 96–100.
Rhumosa
n. gen. in natura.
96,
Rhumosa bolognei
n. gen. n. sp.
97:
Rhumosa macoucheriei
n. gen. n. sp.
98:
Rhumosa depazei
n. gen. n. sp.
99:
Rhumosa admiralrodneyei
n. gen. n. sp.
100:
Rhumosa captainblighei
n. gen. n. sp.
Note the distinctive coloration of
Rhumosa macoucheriei
n. gen. n. sp.
All are adult specimens.
